answers.answer: Im high risk but cuz of a weak cervix. The best thing to do is stay positive and keep your doctor fully informed about your worries and what you go through during the pregnancy. Dont be shy about anything the more you say the more your doctor knows the more they can help. I hope this helps, you can msg me whenever if you need to. Goodluck(:
Thank you! I've been very communicative with my doctor these last few months. :)

I am a high riak and am always a high risk pregnancy for gestational diabetes they always seem to catch it in the begining of all my pregnancies but everything always turns out fine i always keep my ob on speed dial lol but its better to be safe thab sorry!
Im high risk also because I have an incompetent cervix... Im now 30wks
Thank you ladies i feel more reassured that my pregnancy is going to be ok :)

question: So I'm considered high risk because i have lupus... Have any of you ladies been high risk before? I'm just a bit worried. I get to go to the pareontologist next Monday... And I'm just a bit worried... :(
title: high risk mommas?
